strapiPost.title: Internal Medicine Residency Beginning In Fayetteville
strapiPost.content:
UAMS and Washington Regional are joining forces to create a new internal medicine residency program here in NWA. 

  • Welcome: The program will bring eight medical residents to NWA each year as they train to be skilled internists. WRMC has built a brand new 6,000-sq-ft GME Suite to house the residents. 
  • Training: The residency will provide training in clinical reasoning, critical thinking, teaching, research, and health care delivery with a focus on diverse and underserved populations in NWA. 

Read more on the story HERE.
